channel.title: Jan Kocourek`s website
channel.description: Recent content on Jan Kocourek`s website

item.title: Yet another blog
item.description:
Why write another tech blog?! Link to heading

I’ve been asking myself for about a year now, during which time I’ve created and deleted this blog several times because I thought I had nothing to say. All things said, videos made, tutorials written, problems solved.

BUT…

I think everyone has a different experience installing software, building hardware, and troubleshooting. We receive information and learn in diferent ways.

About me Link to heading

Among my main interests are IT technologies and their use in small and medium-sized enterprises

My goal is to help companies take care of their IT infrastructure, protect their data and improve the organization of processes. I have been working in the IT professional field since 2012, when I started working at CATHEDRAL Software as a 1st level support technician. I managed client endpoints and computer networks. Over time, I expanded my knowledge of data security and maintenance, server management, virtualization and monitoring.
